TopicTitle: After Launch plus Revert to VAB to add stage next press of Launch button hangs forever

Articles.Content:
Made a probe, and did a test launch, but needed some more dV.  Reverted to VAB, and added a stack seperator, tank and engine for a new stage.   Saved.  Pressed Launch.  Follow screen comes up and stays there forever.

In the Player.log, it is infinitely repeating the follow in a series over and over forever:

[Physics] Object reference not set to an instance of an object
